TutorialMessage0: Lucky Six is a draw-based game where players choose six lucky balls out of 48 in a drum. Players have the chance to pick random numbers or even colors, and follow the live draw every five minutes.
TutorialMessage1: This tab shows the statistics of the previous draws.
TutorialMessage2: Here you can see the results of the past rounds.
TutorialMessage3: The main game screen where you can follow the ball drawing process.
TutorialMessage4: Input the amount you want to use to bet and click the ‘Pay In’ icon to place your bet.
TutorialMessage5: History of all the previous tickets you played.
TutorialMessage6: In the betting section you choose what type of bet would you like to play from 5 betting categories.

InvalidBet: Each bet must have a minimal stake of 50!
InvalidBetSystem: Wrong minimum bet for combination bet!
EmptyBet: You can't place an empty bet!
BetFailBalance: You do not have enough balance to place the bet.
BetFailInternalError: Internal server error occured, please try again later.
StandardGameFailBalls: You need to select between 6 and 10 numbers!
NumberInFiveGameFailBalls: You have to select only one number!
ViewTicketTab: Bet added, click ticket tab to view selection
ViewEditedTab: Bet edited, click ticket tab to view selection
Select124: You need to select 1, 2 or 4 ball colors
